pageContext.analysis: Trump said it was be easy to reduce the national debt in a second term. That's absolutely false. It would require discipline and tough negotiations. When Trump first ran for president, he claimed he could easily eliminate the debt in eight years. But instead in his first term he's let the debt skyrocket despite a good economy. Generally the deficit decreases during boom times, but it's increased under Trump because of his tax cut and profligate spending.
